testcase.name: VIR-233.01 Verify that the customer is able to open the Support Ticket form within My Account
VIR-233.02 Verify that the Support Ticket form has the following fields
VIR-233.03 Verify the fields validation rules.
VIR-233.04 Verify that Support Ticket creating can be canceled
VIR-233.05 Verify that the following info is sent to the CRM after creating the Support Ticket
VIR-233.06 Verify that the email is sent by the shopper to the reviewer
VIR-233.07 Verify the email (email comp) shows appropriate information
VIR-233.08 Verify that the ticket is routed to the CSR to review
VIR-233.09 Verify that the shopper can see the support tickets created by them
VIR-233.10 Verify that the shopper can see the status of the support ticket within ticket history.
VIR-233.11 Verify that the following information is shown for the ticket within ticket history
